document_categories.description: Documents that are generally required for all applications.

documents.name: Copy of Certificate of Sponsorship (CoS)
documents.details: We will have this from employer.

documents.name: Job Offer letter from new employer
documents.details: We will have this from employer.

documents.name: Evidence of satisfying the English language requirement
documents.details: Either English test/English speaking country/degree certificate.

document_categories.description: Documents that are only required under specific conditions.

documents.name: Bank statements showing sufficient funds to live in the UK
documents.required_condition: Unless the certificate of sponsorship shows your employer can support you.

documents.name: TB test certificate (Tuberculosis test certificate)
documents.required_condition: If you are a national of a country listed in Appendix T of the Immigration Rules.

documents.name: Criminal record certificate
documents.required_condition: If your SOC code is on the list / if their job is in a specific profession.

source_information: Based on provided sources [1-3] and conversation history.
